'''''Islands of the Lost and Forgotten''''' is the second [[Inazuma]] Chapter [[soundtrack]] album.

It features a total of 60 tracks produced by the [[HOYO-MiX]] team and co-produced by Sony Music Entertainment (Japan) Inc. The album is divided into three discs: ''Isles of Serenity and Amnesia'', ''Beneath the Abyssal Depth'', and ''Battles of Inazuma 2''.

The album was first announced on March 18, 2022, during the [[Special Program]] for [[Version 2.6]]. The tracklist was announced on April 7 and the album was later released on April 13.<ref>Weixin: [https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/KKG0WK20Q7bWSViesWu25w {{zh|《原神》第二张稻妻主题OST即将上线}}]</ref>
